description.en: Network discovery and security auditing tool. It scans for open ports, services, and operating systems.
description.ar: أداة اكتشاف الشبكة والتدقيق الأمني. تقوم بفحص المنافذ المفتوحة والخدمات وأنظمة التشغيل.

description.en: Web reconnaissance framework for gathering information from open sources.
description.ar: إطار استطلاع الويب لجمع المعلومات من المصادر المفتوحة.

description.en: Graphical tool for link analysis and data visualization.
description.ar: أداة رسومية لتحليل الروابط وتصور البيانات.

description.en: Collects emails, subdomains, and names from public sources.

description.en: Enumerates DNS information, including subdomains and DNS records.

description.en: DNS reconnaissance tool for locating non-contiguous IP space.

description.en: Looks up domain registration information.

description.en: Open-source vulnerability scanner for comprehensive security assessments.

description.en: Web server vulnerability scanner that checks for outdated software and misconfigurations.

description.en: Scans web applications for vulnerabilities like SQL injection and XSS.

description.en: Open-source security auditing tool with a plugin-based architecture.

description.en: Suite of tools for wireless network security, including cracking WEP/WPA keys.

description.en: Wireless network detector and sniffer for monitoring traffic.

description.en: Automated wireless attack tool for cracking WEP/WPA/WPS.

description.en: GUI-based tool for cracking wireless networks.

description.en: WPS brute-force tool for attacking Wi-Fi Protected Setup.

description.en: Brute-force tool for attacking WPS-enabled routers.

description.en: Web application security testing tool with proxy, scanner, and intruder features.
